simulation.world.animal.group

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.world.animal.group.Group
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AimedObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CarnivorousGroup, HerbivorousGroup

    public abstract class Group
extends java.lang.Object
implements AimedObject
    A group of animals, as described by animal, which is a species, and groupState, which is the current state of this group.
    Author:
    SOARES Lucas
